projects.title: UI-Auto Nokian tyres
projects.text: The 'autotestForNokianTyres' project is a thesis by QA.GURU aimed at automating user interface testing for NOKIAN TYRES. The project uses various technologies and tools, including Selenide for UI testing, Gradle for project assembly, JUnit 5 for testing, Jenkins for test execution, and Allure TestOps for visualization of test results. Jira and Telegram Bot are also integrated into the project for management and notification. Tests test the functionality of pages, such as browsing and activating extended warranty.
